description.plain:
Jesy Nelson (born June 14, 1991) is a pop singer, who was a member of the hit British girl band Little Mix alongside Perrie Edwards, Leigh-Anne Pinnock, and Jade Thirlwall. They were formed during the 8th season of the television music competition The X Factor, and were the first band to win the show. They’ve since released six albums under Simon Cowell’s Syco Music before parting ways in November 2018. Jesy is also well known for her 18 month engagement to Rixton’s lead singer Jake Rouche.

In the early August, Nelson was mostly affected by cyberbullying and the criticism of her image, which ultimately led to the release of Odd One Out on BBC Three in September 2019. It contained the singer’s struggles with online trolling, including the confession about a suicide attempt over Katie Hopkins' tweet in November 2013, as she spoke about it, saying quote:

I was sat in bed crying, thinking [Starts sobbing.] I just remember thinking, “This is never going to go”. I’m going to constantly wake up and feel sad for the rest of my life, so, what is the point in being here? There is no point in waking up and feeling sad everyday. […] I physically couldn’t tolerate the pain anymore. It feels constantly feeling heartbroken. I remember feeling this has to go away and it was the first time I thought I’m going to do this, I’m going to end this. […] I remember going to the kitchen and I took as many tablets as I could. […] I just laid in bed for ages and thought ‘Hurry up and let it happen.‘ […] My ex who was with me at the time woke up and said, ‘Why are you crying?’ I said ‘I just want to die. I just want it to go away.’

Jesy was a part of the group until December 14, 2020, where the three remaining girls took to twitter confirming that Jesy had decided that she was leaving the group to focus on her mental health. Five months after leaving Little Mix, Jesy was signed to  Polydor Records as a solo artist.

On October 8, 2021, she released her debut solo single, “Boyz,” featuring American rapper Nicki Minaj. The song debuted and peaked at number four on the UK Singles Chart.

songs.full_title: Boyz by Jesy Nelson (Ft. Nicki Minaj)
songs.title: Boyz

description.plain:
“Boyz” is the debut solo single by English singer Jesy Nelson featuring Trinidadian rapper Nicki Minaj. The song samples rapper Diddy’s “Bad Boys For Life.” The track was officially announced on September 28, 2021, and released a week later alongside a music video which Jesy herself directed.

On this 90s inspired hip-hop-esque track, Jesy proclaims her attraction to a very specific type of “bad boy.” The song had been being teased since early August, with Jesy first hinting the music was on the way in an Instagram post.

songs.embed_content: Read “Boyz” by Jesy Nelson on Genius

songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Nicki Minaj]
Ayo, it's the UK baddie and the Barbie

[Verse 1: Jesy Nelson]
Love a little bitter in the sweet
Bad boy, my recipe
Bein' nice a little borin' when you in between the sheets
When I ride that hee-haw, you know I know how to please ya

[Refrain: Jesy Nelson]
Ooh, I like them tattoos and them gold teeth
Type to make me feel like I'm a baddie
I like the fire you're bringin' out of me
Baby, somethin' 'bout him got me weak in the knees

[Pre-Chorus: Jesy Nelson]
The hold that you got should be criminal
My mama won't see what I see in ya
But I don't want it if it ain't bad enough
I don't know what it is, but

[Chorus: Jesy Nelson]
I like a bad, bad boy (Boy)
You know I like a bad, bad boy (Boy)
I like a bad boy, you can't stop me
I love bad boys for life
I like a bad, bad boy (Bad boy)
You know I like a bad, bad boy (Bad boy)
I like a bad boy, you can't stop me
I love bad boys for life

[Verse 2: Jesy Nelson]
Got a little attitude, but I think he's kinda cute
So hood, so good, so damn taboo
Know you know how to please me
Like it raw, baby, sashimi

[Refrain: Jesy Nelson]
Ooh, I like them tattoos and them gold teeth
Type to make me feel like I'm a baddie
I like the fire you're bringin' out of me
Baby, somethin' 'bout him got me weak in the knees

[Pre-Chorus: Jesy Nelson]
The hold that you got should be criminal
My mama won't see what I see in ya
But I don't want it if it ain't bad enough
I don't know what it is, but

[Chorus: Jesy Nelson]
I like a bad, bad boy (Boy)
You know I like a bad, bad boy (Boy)
I like a bad boy, you can't stop me
I love bad boys for life
I like a bad, bad boy (Bad boy)
You know I like a bad, bad boy (Boy)
I like a bad boy, you can't stop me
I love bad boys for life

[Verse 3: Nicki Minaj]
(As we proceed, to give you what you need)
Bad bitches want a bad boy (Come on)
Word to Biggie, Diddy, and Mase (Woo)
Woah, like Rob, won't find a prettier face (Let's go)
He gon' keep my VVS's dancing like Total
So I could just shine while he shoot up the place (Prrr)
Raspberries, cherries, and berries, I'm edible
Do these bitches like a library, done read 'em all
My body smokin', come get a pull
Lucky charms on my anklets, no, not cereal
Jesy, we got all these jelly bitches actin' real messy
Still a bad bitch whether I'm sporty or I'm dressy
I don't know why I got these dudes actin' zesty
But I only want a bad boy as my bestie

[Chorus: Jesy Nelson]
I like a bad, bad boy
You know I like a bad, bad boy (Gotta, gotta have a bad boy)
I like a bad boy, you can't stop me
I love bad boys for life (Ooh, want a bad, bad boy)
I like a bad, bad boy
You know I like a bad, bad boy
I like a bad boy, you can't stop me
I love bad boys for life

[Outro: Nicki Minaj]
It's Nicki and Jesy
He love me, and plus he
Ready to knock a motherfucker out just to impress me (Woo)

songs.title: Bad Thing

description.plain:
“Bad Thing” serves as Jesy Nelson’s second solo release after her departure from Little Mix back in  December of 2020, and her comeback to music after a year and a half hiatus from her last single, “Boyz.” It also marks her first release as an independent artists following her split from Polydor in July 2022.

Although it doesn’t depart much from her last release with its lyrical content, as both touch on Jesy’s tendency of falling for the wrong guys and following her heart instead of her mind, it contrasts from “Boyz” through its rich instrumentation and production. “Bad Thing” finds influence in vintage Hollywood and indie pop sounds, reminiscent of artists like Billie Eilish and Lana Del Rey.

The music video is inspired by her parents relationship. The couple split when she was five years old, resulting in Jesy being estranged from her father. She opened up about it in an interview with The Mirror while promoting her last release:

Growing up my dad wasn’t around. He wasn’t the best, he was in and out of prison, so I haven’t had many good men role models in my life.

songs.embed_content: Read “Bad Thing” by Jesy Nelson on Genius

The music video is inspired by her parents relationship. The couple split when she was five years old, resulting in Jesy being estranged from her father. She opened up about it in an interview with The Mirror while promoting her last release:

songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Hey, we started at the end
Another second chance
To fuck it up again
I know I'm good alone
But you feel just like home
My favourite kind of wrong
Familiar as a song, oh

[Pre-Chorus]
When I'm 'bout to say bye-bye
I forget what I cried about last time
Only thing I'm seein' clearly is I'm love blind
I would trade common sense for a good time
Oh, it'll never be easy
How the fuck you got me out here feelin' needy?
If you gave it all, you still wouldn't complete me
I'ma keep on coming back until you leave me

[Chorus]
Damn, I've done a bad thing (Bad thing)
I know you're damaged goods
Is it a bad thing (Bad thing)
That I wanna treat you good?
You're the worst of my habits
And I wouldn't fix it if I could
When I've done a bad thing
I know you're damaged goods

[Verse 2]
I, I know what I deserve
But you just say the words
And I won't put me first
Especially at night
A simple text ignites
A flame back to my life
But that don't make it right

[Pre-Chorus]
'Cause when I'm 'bout to say bye-bye
I forget what I cried about last time
Only thing I'm seein' clearly is I'm love blind
I would trade common sense for a good time
Oh, it'll never be easy
How the fuck you got me out here feelin' needy?
If you gave it all, you still wouldn't complete me
I'ma keep on coming back until you leave me

[Chorus]
Damn, I've done a bad thing (Bad thing)
I know you're damaged goods (Goods)
Is it a bad thing (Bad thing)
That I wanna treat you good?
You're the worst of my habits
And I wouldn't fix it if I could
Damn, I've done a bad thing
I know you're damaged goods

[Bridge]
I won't repeat you
Oh, I'll delete you
I promise I'll be better off, I swear
And this is the good part
First I'll take back my heart
Then act like I don't care

[Chorus]
And I do a bad thing
Knowing you're damaged goods
Is it a bad thing
That I wanna treat you good?
You're the worst of my habits
And I wouldn't fix it if I could
Damn, I've done a bad thing
And I know I'm damaged goods
